trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF017_03476_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The hasty hunter looks at you pleadingly.
TEXT_LUCKZF017_03476_FANOWHUNTER03476_000_000<tab>Thank goodness you are here. I need your help.
TEXT_LUCKZF017_03476_FANOWHUNTER03476_000_001<tab>One of the stone guardians in the ruins, it...it attacked our sisters.
TEXT_LUCKZF017_03476_FANOWHUNTER03476_000_002<tab>I would go and help them, but I fear I cannot do it alone. Please, I beg you─come with me to the Morning Stars.
TEXT_LUCKZF017_03476_FANOWHUNTER03476_000_003<tab>You came! Thank the gods. There is yet one more to the north, closer to the Great Pyramid.
TEXT_LUCKZF017_03476_FANOWHUNTER03476_000_004<tab>I will see to this one here. Go and save our sister. When you have her, take her back to Fanow.
TEXT_LUCKZF017_03476_ESCAPEVIIS03476_000_011<tab>I believe I am well enough to walk on my own. Let us hurry back, before another sentinel arrives.
TEXT_LUCKZF017_03476_FANOWHUNTER03476_000_020<tab>You are returned. Good. All of our hunters are accounted for.
TEXT_LUCKZF017_03476_FANOWHUNTER03476_000_021<tab>The sentinels have helped guard these ruins for centuries. It is unsettling to know they may now turn on us at any given moment.
TEXT_LUCKZF017_03476_FANOWHUNTER03476_000_022<tab>Such a thing was inconceivable before the Flood, but as the Light takes its toll they grow increasingly erratic.
TEXT_LUCKZF017_03476_FANOWHUNTER03476_000_023<tab>Indeed, it has made our duty to these ruins all the more difficult, but we will not be dissuaded from doing what must be done.
TEXT_LUCKZF017_03476_FANOWHUNTER03476_000_024<tab>It is not much, but I would like you to have this. For helping save my sisters. I pray we can count on your aid should we have need of it again.
